data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Sremski do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sremski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sremski. Through your servants plant 426 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sremski, Serbia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sremski, Serbia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Egyptian, Balkan people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Egyptian, Balkan people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Egyptian, Balkan people is yours.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sremski, Serbia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 15,325 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Sremski, Serbia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
